input.sentences: the family poses together before their thanksgiving dinner .
the food is set up on the counter .
the children have their own table .
after eating the men gather in the living room .
the kids are tired after their large meal .
output.sentences: On Thanksgiving everyone poses in a family portrait.
The table is set with food and there are also dishes on the counter.
There is a small table where children sit.
In the living room people gather to relax after eating.
Finally, tired people end the meal and spend time with their kids.
